content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, I'm glad we are talking about the rental price. I am looking for the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make an offer, and we can negotiate from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 500 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for my liking. I am looking for a higher price for my apartment. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 700 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's better, but I am still looking for more. How about 800 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros is my final offer. I cannot go any higher.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 750 euros is still too low for me. I am looking for a price of at least 800 euros per month. Please make a higher offer if you want to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize, but 750 euros is the highest I can offer. I cannot go any higher.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, but I must decline your offer. I am looking for a price of at least 800 euros per month. Please make a higher offer if you want to continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros is the best I can do. I cannot go any higher. If you don't agree, we will have to terminate the negotiation. Is that what you want?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
